name: The Wrong House?
description:
This is my very first Unreal Engine 4 game/horror game that I gave myself a whole month to make. So, if the game is not great... then that's alright lol

If you get stuck, remember... whenever and wherever you are SAFE... listen out.

After this project, I am going back to Unity to make more games because I really am not a fan of Unreal Engine.

I'm not expecting anyone to say this is a good game in the SLIGHTEST... but if you do say it's a good game... I wanna know why LMAO.
